{{Wired embedded system |brand=WatchGuard |model=Firebox Edge XTM 22 |revision=(XP3E6) |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |est_release_date=09/2009 |fcc_date=10/02/2009 |fcc_id=Q6G-XP3E6W |ic_id=4657A-XP3E6W |pcb_id=YM100C-1.6mm |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP435 |cpu1_cspeed=667 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F2G08U0B-PCB0 |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV800CTTC-70G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QG-HCE6 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, CON1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E6060;88E6060-RCJ1; |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366SR |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=3 |addl_chips=2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Texas Instruments;LM358;;1;,,, 1.5A/3A Bus Termination Regulator;Advanced Power;AP1250GM;;1;,,, 5.3A, 30V P-Channel Power MOSFET;Silicon Standard;SSM9435GM;;2;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1117;;2;,,, Positive Edge-triggered 3-State Octal D-type Flip-Flop;NXP;74HC374N;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-OR Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC32A;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, heatsink |stock_boot=Redboot;2.04;WatchGuard |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21.7; |default_ip=10.0.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=readwrite |oui_eth=00:90:7F }} {{TagLine|WatchGuard Firebox XTM 2 Series (XTM 22)}} :''Internet Firewall with VPN''
